hadiths.text: Abdullah bin 'Amr used to say:"The Messenger of Allah forbade offering more for something that has already been bought by his brother, or for a man to propose marriage to a woman when someone else has already proposed to her, unless the previous suitor gave up the idea or gave him permission

chapter.ara-name: باب خِطْبَةِ الرَّجُلِ إِذَا تَرَكَ الْخَاطِبُ أَوْ أَذِنَ لَهُ .
chapter.eng-name: Proposing Marriage When The Other Suitor Gives Up The Idea Or Gives Permission
